cards.name: "No.1 Oddball" Hange
cards.text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Corps》 or 《Titan》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

cards.name: "Paving a Way for the Future" Mikasa
cards.text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a 《Corps》 character, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.

cards.name: "Honor on the Battlefield" Eren
cards.text: [AUTO] When this card direct attacks, choose one of your other characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.[AUTO] When this card becomes [REVERSE], if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put a card from the bottom of your opponent's stock into your opponent's waiting room.

cards.name: Anti-Titan Device "Omni-Directional Mobility Gear"
cards.text: 【COUNTER】 Search your deck for up to one 《Corps》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. Shuffle your deck afterwards, choose up to one of your 《Corps》 characters in battle, and move it to an open position of your stage.

cards.name: Anti-Titan Device "Omni-Directional Mobility Gear"
cards.text: 【COUNTER】 Search your deck for up to one 《Corps》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. Shuffle your deck afterwards, choose up to one of your 《Corps》 characters in battle, and move it to an open position of your stage.

cards.name: Anti-Titan Device "Omni-Directional Mobility Gear"
cards.text: 【COUNTER】 Choose up to one of your 《Corps》 characters in battle, return it to your hand, choose up to one character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

cards.name: Anti-Titan Device "Omni-Directional Mobility Gear"
cards.text: 【COUNTER】 Choose up to one of your 《Corps》 characters in battle, return it to your hand, choose up to one character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

cards.name: "Predation" Titan
cards.text: 【CONT】 You can put any number of cards with the same card name as this card into your deck.【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other cards in the center stage named ""Predation" Titan".

cards.name: "My Fate to Bear" Eren
cards.text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of other characters you have with "Eren(エレン)" or "Mikasa(ミカサ)" or "Armin(アルミン)" in its card name.【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if a card named "Yell of Rage" is in your climax area, choose up to one card named "Anti-Titan Device "Omni-Directional Mobility Gear"" in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and this card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, you may return this card to your hand."

cards.name: "104th Cadet Corps Class" Mikasa
cards.text:
【AUTO】 This ability activates up to two times per turn. When another of your 《Corps》 character is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
【AUTO】 Change [(2) Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your encore step, if this card is 【REST】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named ""Resisting Fate" Mikasa" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.

cards.name: "Resisting Fate" Armin
cards.text:
【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects.
【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Corps》 characters in front of this card get +2000 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects."
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, and put it into your hand. Put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Corps》 characters you have.

cards.name: "Resisting Fate" Eren
cards.text:
【CONT】 If your opponent has a level 3 or higher character, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Corps》 characters.
【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal one damage to your opponent. (This damage may be canceled)
